name: Human Impact
description: Human Impact is a combination of Safety and Mission impacts.

values.name: Low
values.description: Safety Impact:(None OR Minor) AND Mission Impact:(None OR Degraded OR Crippled)

values.name: Medium
values.description: (Safety Impact:(None OR Minor) AND Mission Impact:MEF Failure) OR (Safety Impact:Major AND Mission Impact:(None OR Degraded OR Crippled))

values.name: High
values.description: (Safety Impact:Hazardous AND Mission Impact:(None OR Degraded OR Crippled)) OR (Safety Impact:Major AND Mission Impact:MEF Failure)

values.name: Very High
values.description: Safety Impact:Catastrophic OR Mission Impact:Mission Failure
